Articles.Content: Even though they aren't out yet there is clearly a lot of interest and we are seeing a lot of topics posted about them as they draw closer.  It might be time to create forums for the console versions discussion.
I think they will be created when the console versions are released, or at least when they're close to being released.
As far as I know the console and PC versions of KSP will be the same version (1.1) so there will be no need to be console forums.
The console versions, as I have been told, will be on the sties of the companies in charge of doing the port to them.
